thread.title: Trail Blazers vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Game preview
thread.title_full: Trail Blazers vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Game preview | OregonLive.com

author: Joe Freeman | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Trail Blazers vs. Los Angeles Lakers: Game preview
text:
Trail Blazers (3-2) at Lakers (2-4)
7:30 p.m. Monday at the Staples Center
radio on KPOJ (620) Los Angeles' projected starters No. Name Height Position Statistics 6 Jordan Clarkson 6-5 PG 12.7 ppg, 2.3.8 apg 1 D'Angelo Russell 6-5 SG 5.0 ppg, 3.8 apg 3 Anthony Brown 6-7 G/F 2.2 ppg, 0.8 rpg 3 Julius Randle 6-9 PF 13.0 ppg, 5.5 rpg 17 Roy Hibbert 7-2 C 6.5 ppg, 9.7 rpg
Portland's projected starters No. Name Height Position Statistics 0 Damian Lillard 6-3 PG 23.7 ppg, 4.0 apg, 3.3 rpg 3 CJ McCollum 6-3 SG 19.2 ppg, 5.4 apg 8 Al-Farouq Aminu 6-9 SF 12.7 ppg, 6.0 rpg 11 Meyers Leonard 7-1 PF 11.2 ppg, 6.6 rpg 24 Mason Plumlee 6-11 C 5.6 ppg, 6.2 rpg
About the Lakers: Of the 19 players on Los Angeles' training camp roster, 11 are either rookies or second-year players. Seven of the 11 are rookies. ... Kobe Bryant, who is entering his 20th season in the NBA — all with the Lakers — is expected to sit the rest of the exhibition season to rest an ailing left leg. ... Bryant ranks third on the NBA's all-time scoring list with 32,482 points. Only Kareem Abdul-Jabbar (38,387) and Karl Malone (36,928) have scored more. ... He's the only player in NBA history to record at least 30,000 points and 6,000 assists. ... After being named a starter for the final 38 games of the 2014-15 season, Clarkson averaged 15.8 points, 5.0 assists, 4.2 rebounds and 1.05 steals per game, while shooting 45.8 percent from the field.
About the Blazers: Portland defeated the Utah Jazz Sunday night in overtime, 116-111, at the Moda Center. ... CJ McCollum scored 18 points and made 8 of 11 shots in the fourth quarter en route to a dazzling 26-point, nine-assist outing. ... Lillard added 32 points and six assists. ... The Blazers overcame a 21-point deficit in the victory. ... Tonight marks the second-to-last exhibition game of the season for the Blazers, who end the preseason Thursday night against the Los Angeles Clippers at the Staples Center. ... Aminu did not play against the Jazz. After going through pregame warmups, the small forward felt a twinge in his left hamstring, so he sat out. The injury, officially labeled a strain, is not considered serious.
Injuries: For Portland, guard Gerald Henderson (hip) and forward Cliff Alexander (left knee bone bruise) will not play . For the Lakers, guard Kobe Bryant (left leg bruise) and Lou Williams (sore groin) are out.
— Joe Freeman | jfreeman@oregonian.com | 503-294-5183 | @BlazerFreeman
